entities.description: The frequency count of responses before any weighting adjustments.
Number of missing data items within a given variable.
The total number of cases or responses collected.
Date when the ORI (Originating Agency Identifier) was added.
Date when the ORI transitioned to National Incident-Based Reporting System (NIBRS).

relationships.description: Indicates the count of responses before any adjustments.
Represents the number of data items not recorded.
Refers to the dataset's entire number of recorded responses.
Denotes the specific date when the ORI was added.
Marks the date when the ORI adopted the NIBRS.
